import axios from"axios";export var GET_LIST_JOB='GET_LIST_JOB';export var SEARCH_LIST_JOB='SEARCH_LIST_JOB';export var FIND_JOB_LIST='FIND_JOB_LIST';export var DETAIL_JOB_LIST='DETAIL_JOB_LIST';export var jobList=function jobList(){return function(dispatch){// loading 
console.log('2. loading masuk action');dispatch({type:GET_LIST_JOB,payload:{loading:true,data:false,errorMassage:false}});// get Api 
axios({method:'GET',url:"http://dev3.dansmultipro.co.id/api/recruitment/positions.json",timeout:120000}).then(function(Response){// berhasil
console.log("3. data berhasil masuk",Response.data);dispatch({type:GET_LIST_JOB,payload:{loading:false,data:Response.data,errorMassage:false}});}).catch(function(error){console.log("gagal");dispatch({type:GET_LIST_JOB,payload:{loading:false,data:false,errorMassage:error.massage}});});};};export var searchJobList=function searchJobList(data){return function(dispatch){// loading 
dispatch({type:SEARCH_LIST_JOB,payload:{loading:true,data:false,errorMassage:false}});// get Api 
console.log(data);axios({method:'GET',url:"http://dev3.dansmultipro.co.id/api/recruitment/positions.json?description=".concat(data.description,"&location=").concat(data.location,"&type=").concat(data.type),timeout:120000}).then(function(Response){// berhasil
console.log("3. data berhasil masuk",Response.data);dispatch({type:SEARCH_LIST_JOB,payload:{loading:false,data:Response.data,errorMassage:false}});}).catch(function(error){console.log("gagal");dispatch({type:SEARCH_LIST_JOB,payload:{loading:false,data:false,errorMassage:error.massage}});});};};export var findJobList=function findJobList(data){return function(dispatch){// loading 
dispatch({type:FIND_JOB_LIST,payload:{loading:true,data:false,errorMassage:false}});// get Api 
axios({method:'GET',url:"http://dev3.dansmultipro.co.id/api/recruitment/positions.json?description=".concat(data.description,"&location=").concat(data.location,"&type=").concat(data.type),timeout:120000}).then(function(Response){// berhasil
console.log("3. data berhasil masuk");dispatch({type:FIND_JOB_LIST,payload:{loading:false,data:Response.data,errorMassage:false}});}).catch(function(error){console.log("gagal");dispatch({type:FIND_JOB_LIST,payload:{loading:false,data:false,errorMassage:error.massage}});});};};export var detailJobList=function detailJobList(data){return function(dispatch){// loading 
dispatch({type:DETAIL_JOB_LIST,payload:{loading:true,data:false,errorMassage:false}});// get Api 
axios({method:'GET',url:"http://dev3.dansmultipro.co.id/api/recruitment/positions/".concat(data),timeout:120000}).then(function(Response){dispatch({type:DETAIL_JOB_LIST,payload:{loading:false,data:Response.data,errorMassage:false}});}).catch(function(error){console.log("gagal");dispatch({type:DETAIL_JOB_LIST,payload:{loading:false,data:false,errorMassage:error.massage}});});};};
